titleStmt.title: Jasper N. Bertram Personal Documents and Correspondance
titleStmt.author: Various Authors
titleStmt.editor: Jules Lockett, Sofia Posada, Nic Staley

publicationStmt.p: Publication Information - how we are publishing in the context of our class

sourceDesc.p:
The J.N. Bertram letters are a collection of letters that include personal corrisponse, business corrispondece, and newspaper clippings. The material transcribed in this edition is a sample from those three categories, including handwritten letters, typewritten corrispondece, and newpaper clippings.
Pamphlet title Various publisher, if you can identify this date supplies any form of identifier used to identify some object: an ISBN, call #

normalization.p: All spellings were taken directly from the source, with no editing.

quotation.p: info about how you approached quoted text

correction.p: If you discovered errors in your text, you can talk here about where you decided to correct them or not - Errors were left unedited; any mispellings that appear in the text were directly from the source.

interpretation.p: You can add interpretive info here.

body.p: This is Nic trying to use GitHub, send help
